settings.description:
Whistle Switch is a smart pet collar that comes with 2 interchangeable batteries that can be switched on the go, so you are always connected. Discover our new sleek design.

Great for dogs as small as 5 lbs

A smart pet device which you can clip or attach on any collar. Built for the outdoors and every adventure, includes a night light.

Best for dogs 20 lbs and up

A smart pet device to monitor your dog's health and fitness. Can clip or attach on any collar.

Great for dogs of all sizes

settings.title: Know Their Location
settings.subtitle: Whether they’re down the street or across the country, instantly and accurately locate them with AT&T’s network and Google Maps.
settings.text2: Pinpoint their location anywhere in the US

settings.title: Know Their Health
settings.subtitle: Catch potential health issues before they become problems. Get insights about your pet’s licking, scratching and sleeping every week. Send a 30-day summary to your vet via email.
settings.text1: Elevated itching can mean rashes, allergies, or infection
settings.text2: Increased drinking can show early signs of kidney disease or diabetes
settings.text3: Excessive licking could be a sign of discomfort, pain, or dietary issues
settings.text4: Sleep disruptions may point to sleep disorders or insomnia

settings.title: Know Their Fitness
settings.subtitle: Achieve fitness goals based on breed, age, and weight. Track your pet’s calories burned, distance traveled, minutes active, and more. Earn badges for milestones.
settings.text1: Be sure they’re getting the right amount of exercise
settings.text2: See distance traveled, minutes active, and more

settings.title: Stiffness & pain
settings.subtitle: Excessive licking may point to pain

settings.title: Overweight or obese
settings.subtitle: Most dogs need at least 20 mins of exercise

settings.title: Itchy, irritated skin
settings.subtitle: Increased scratching could be a sign of allergies/infection

settings.title: Why Give A Lick?
settings.subtitle: Sources: Petbest / Petresort / akc.org

settings.text: “I routinely use Jack’s Whistle to let me know when he needs his next Cytopoint injection and it also helps me gauge when I need to get him more activity to keep his weight normalized!”
settings.subtitle:
Molly McAllister, DVM, MPH

Chief Medical Officer, Banfield Pet Hospital

settings.text: “My 3 year old German shorthaired pointer, Sandy gained several pounds. Her Whistle tracker showed that she did half her normal mileage and wasn’t burning as many calories. Looking at the objective data from her activity, a ligament injury was highly likely. An exam confirmed. Her signs before the surgery were incredibly subtle but her Whistle data told a different story.”
settings.subtitle: Aletha Carson, DVM

settings.pretitle: Sign up for offers & learn more about Whistle 360º tracking

settings.title: See How Whistle GO Explore Works
settings.text: Whistle Go Explore is a GPS location, health, and fitness smart tracking device that captures your dog’s location and monitors their behaviors. The Whistle app offers you a window into the daily lives of your pets anywhere they go.

settings.title: Know their location
settings.text:
With accurate GPS tracking via AT&T’s nationwide 4G LTE network and Google Maps, you can:

Get alerts if your dog escapes

Get notified when your dog walker takes them on a stroll

Pinpoint their location anywhere in North America

Track their movements every 15 seconds

settings.title: Know their health
settings.text:
Only Whistle 360º Pet Monitoring monitors 4 common dog behaviors that can alert you to early signs of illness:

Elevated scratching can mean skin allergies, irritation, or infection

Increased drinking can show early signs of kidney disease or diabetes

Excessive licking could be a sign of discomfort, pain, or dietary issues

Sleep disruptions may point to sleep disorders or insomnia

settings.title: Know their fitness
settings.text:
Get custom goals based on your dog’s age, weight, and breed, so you can:

Be sure they're getting enough exercise

See distance traveled, minutes active, and more

Serve the correct food portions

Celebrate and share achievements

settings.title: We're in the business to improve your pet's health

settings.title: Health Monitoring
settings.subtitle:
Catch potential health issues before they become problems. Whistle algorithms analyze your pet's licking, scratching, drinking, and sleeping week-over-week, and alert you to abnormalities.

Send a 30-day summary to your vet by email.

settings.title: Location Alerts
settings.subtitle: Whether it’s a sneaky escape or a stroll with your dogwalker, get notified when your pet leaves a designated safe place by email, text, or app alert.

settings.title: Fitness Features
settings.subtitle: Set fitness goals based on breed, age, and weight. Track your pet's calories burned, distance traveled, minutes active, and more. Earn badges for milestones.

settings.title: TELE-VET
settings.subtitle: Get access to a vet through the Whistle app. Through chat, call, video or email, our Vets give advice and guidance to help answer questions so you can avoid unnecessary (and expensive!) vet visits.

settings.title: Food Portion Calculator
settings.subtitle: Use the Whistle calculator to personalize your pet's food portions based on their age, breed, weight, exercise levels, and types of dog food.

settings.title: 24-Hour Timeline
settings.subtitle: See where they went, who they were with, and for how long. Get chronological breakdowns of time spent running, playing, walking, napping, and more.

settings.title: Reasons you’ll love Whistle Switch
settings.subtitle: Click on each link to learn more

settings.title: Monitor Activity
settings.text: Use Whistle Switch to set your dog’s custom activity goals, and get personalized recommendations based on his age, weight, and breed

settings.title: Monitor Behavior
settings.text: Do you know how much your dog moves during the day? Track his activity, rest, calories burned and more to keep him in tip-top shape

settings.title: Tele-vet
settings.text: Use the Whistle app to chat with a Vet. From the the app tap on the Health tab. Scroll past your health metrics, then tap "Chat with a Vet"

settings.title: Share Reports With Your Vet
settings.text: Whistle health monitoring makes it easy to view your pet’s health trends over the last 30 days—all in one place. Each health trend is shown as a 30-day bar graph of daily totals. If you’re headed to the vet or start to notice unusual behaviors, use the “Email a Vet” button in the app to send a link right to your vet so you can monitor your pet’s health together. Vets absolutely love having the data to help your pets live their longest, happiest lives!

settings.title: How long does the battery last?
settings.text: The battery life for Whistle depends greatly on a lot of different factors, primarily how much time your dog spends at home, and how often you are tracking. If your dog spends most of their time within range of the WiFi network at home, the battery will last the longest. We recommend to charge at 25% or less, the app will notify you when the battery is low.

settings.title: Will the tracker work without cellular service? Can I use Whistle just on WiFi with no cellular service?
settings.text: No, The Whistle Switch needs a cellular connection with AT&T’s LTE network in order to provide locations while away from home

settings.title: How does Whistle track? Is it real-time?
settings.text: In order to find a balance between helpful updates and prolonged battery life, the Whistle is not 100% real-time. Whistle is an assisted-GPS device, which means it uses information from both AT&T cellular towers and satellites to triangulate its position and report it to you

settings.title: Why did I get a false alert?
settings.text: This is typically an issue when the tracker is near a WiFi "dead zone."  Not all homes are built with the same materials, so if your device finds one of these WiFi "dead zones", the GPS accuracy can also be affected, placing your pet's location outside of your Safe Place

settings.title: How do I set up my replacement Whistle?
settings.text: Tap on the Human tab, then select the option for setting up a new Whistle. You’ll have the option to choose your existing pet profile and keep the same subscription

settings.title: Do I need to have an AT&T Plan to use my Whistle?
settings.text: No, your Whistle tracker is like a miniature cell phone for your dog! As such, it requires its own cellular plan, but is separate from the plan you have for your own phone. Whistle leverages AT&T’s 4G network to provide you the greatest coverage and fastest response, but you don’t need to be an AT&T customer to use Whistle. Your 360 subscription plan takes care of the cellular connection, so you can keep on adventuring with no interruptions

settings.title: Do I Need A Subscription For My Whistle Device?
settings.text: Whistle trackers are both a device and service. Subscription plans cover location, health and fitness monitoring, including proactive notifications, alerts, personalized health reports and more. The Whistle GO Explore subscription plans also cover cellular data connection to provide GPS location tracking.

settings.title: Share Reports With Your Vet
settings.subtitle: Generate a 30-day report view of your dog’s daily scratching and licking habits to quickly share with your vet. Monitor when your dog’s itchiness started rising, helping you compare and reflect on changes in your dog’s lifestyle that may have led to the itchiness.

settings.title: Help Us Expand Knowledge
settings.content: Whistle FIT collects and shares over 50 samples of your pet’s movement every second, enabling our research team to look for hidden insights and discover never-before-seen patterns

settings.title: Be On The Cutting Edge
settings.content: As we discover new links between pet behavior and health, we’ll update Whistle FIT to give you new capabilities and features, offering even greater insight into your pet’s well-being

settings.title: Activity Is Just The Beginning
settings.subtitle: Whistle’s mobile app provides lots of great information to pet owners - but it’s only a small glimpse into the powerful data FIT captures behind the scenes

settings.title: Can I use Whistle without a subscription to just monitor activity?  Why is a subscription required?
settings.text: No, Whistle cannot be used without a subscription plan. The subscription is for the cellular service with AT&T’s network, and the tracker has no way to communicate or update without a cellular plan, including activity monitoring

settings.title: See How Whistle FIT Works
settings.text: Whistle FIT is a health, and fitness smart tracking device that monitors your dog's behaviors. The Whistle app offers you a window into the daily lives of your pets anywhere they go. You can rest assured that your furry friends stay safe, happy, and healthy.

settings.title: Know their health
settings.text:
Only Whistle 360º Pet plan monitors 4 common dog behaviors that can alert you to early signs of illness:

Elevated scratching can mean skin allergies, irritation, or infection

Increased drinking can show early signs of kidney disease or diabetes

Excessive licking could be a sign of discomfort, pain, or dietary issues

Sleep disruptions may point to sleep disorders or insomnia

settings.title: Know their fitness
settings.text:
Get custom goals based on your dog’s age, weight, and breed, so you can:

Be sure they're getting enough exercise

See distance traveled, minutes active, and more

Serve the correct food portions

Celebrate and share achievements

settings.title: Monitor Behavior
settings.text: Easily monitor scratching and licking levels to stay ahead of potential dermatological ailments

settings.title: Monitor Activities
settings.text: Set fitness goals and track your pet's calories burned, distance traveled, minutes active, and more. Earn badges for milestones

settings.title: Tele-vet
settings.text: Use Whistle FIT app to chat with a Vet. From the the app tap on the Health tab. Scroll past your health metrics, then tap "Chat with a Vet"

settings.title: Share Health Reports With Your Vet
settings.text: Whistle health monitoring makes it easy to view your pet’s health trends over the last 30 days—all in one place. Each health trend is shown as a 30-day bar graph of daily totals. If you’re headed to the vet or start to notice unusual behaviors, use the “Email a Vet” button in the app to send a link right to your vet so you can monitor your pet’s health together. Vets absolutely love having the data to help your pets live their longest, happiest lives!

settings.title: Discover Skin & Coat Seasonality And Breed Differences.
Discover Skin & Coat seasonality and breed differences.
Discover Skin & Coat seasonality and breed differences.
Does the Whistle FIT Have a Subscription?
settings.text: Yes, the Whistle FIT does include a subscription. We offer an affordable yearly plan of $59.40 that renews automatically each year. The full amount is due at the time of activation

settings.title: How Long Does the Whistle FIT’s Battery Last?
settings.text: The Whistle FIT can lasts up two weeks on a single charge, making tracking your pet’s activity seamless. We recommend to charge at 25% or less, the app will notify you when the battery is low. Battery life is impacted by Wi-Fi strength & cellular coverage, depending on usage and environment. The FIT comes with a USB charger that brings your FIT back to full charge in about 90 minutes.

settings.title: How Does Whistle Calculate My Pet's Activity?
settings.text: Whistle uses a three-axis accelerometer to estimate the total amount of energy your pet uses each minute. We use that energy estimate to tell if your dog was resting, wandering around the house, or doing more vigorous activity like chasing squirrels or going on a walk.

settings.title: How does my Whistle Tracker Detect Health Insights?
settings.text: Whistle sensors take 150 measurements of your dog’s motion every second. Advanced behavior detection algorithms created by our research partners at Pet Insight Project help detect the unique movement signature of scratching and licking

settings.title: How Does Whistle Estimate How Far My Pet Has Traveled?
settings.text: Whistle uses a three-axis accelerometer to sense how much your pet is moving up to 50 times per second. We used the accelerometer data from walks by tens of thousands of different dogs using our Whistle accelerometer and created an algorithm to transform these acceleration measurements into a distance estimate.

settings.title: How do I purchase a replacement or upgrade my Whistle?
settings.text:
If you’re an existing Whistle customer and already have a subscription plan, you can purchase a replacement or upgrade your current tracker by clicking [this link]. Thank you for continuing to be part of the Whistle family!

Note: If you activate the tracker for a new pet, you’ll be able to choose a subscription plan through the app

settings.title: Do I need to have an AT&T Plan to use my Whistle?
settings.text: No, your Whistle tracker is like a miniature cell phone for your dog! As such, it requires its own cellular plan, but is separate from the plan you have for your own phone. Whistle leverages AT&T’s 4G network to provide you the greatest coverage and fastest response, but you don’t need to be an AT&T customer to use Whistle. Your 360 subscription plan takes care of the cellular connection, so you can keep on adventuring with no interruptions

settings.title: Bringing Petcare to Your Fingertips
settings.text: At Whistle, our mission is to give pets their best possible life by empowering the people who love them. We combine science, data, and technology to create products and services that provide peace of mind.

settings.title: Leading The Pack
settings.text: Our expertise in pets, technology, and data analytics has allowed us to develop a system of ever-improving smart products for owners and vets — a system that has the power to enrich each pet-owner relationship, and carries the potential to add years to every pet's life.

settings.title: Peace of Mind
settings.text: Pets rely on you, you rely on Whistle. By striving to provide pet owners and caregivers with groundbreaking insights, our team is enabling a new era of proactive, preventive care for pets.

This collar can track your dog's location with 15 second updates.

It is waterproof rated IPX8, which means it can be submerged in water up to 6 feet.

Achieve fitness goals by tracking distance, calories, and duration

Set reminders for vet visits, grooming, meds, play dates, and more

settings.title: Whistle Switch Smart Collar Plans
settings.subtitle: Whistle devices cannot be used without a subscription plan. The subscription is for the cellular service with AT&T’s network, and the tracker has no way to communicate or update without a cellular plan, including activity and health monitoring

settings.title: See How Whistle Switch Works
settings.text: Whistle Switch is a GPS location, health, and fitness smart tracking collar that captures your dog’s location and monitors their behaviors. It comes with comes with 2 interchangeable batteries that can be switched on the go, so you are always connected. The Whistle app offers you a window into the daily lives of your pets anywhere they go. You can rest assured that your furry friends stay safe, happy, and healthy.

settings.title: Know their location
settings.text:
With accurate GPS tracking via AT&T’s nationwide 4G LTE network and Google Maps, you can:

Get alerts if your dog escapes

Get notified when your dog walker takes them on a stroll

Pinpoint their location anywhere in North America

Track their movements every 15 seconds

settings.title: Know their health
settings.text:
Only Whistle 360º Pet Monitoring monitors 4 common dog behaviors that can alert you to early signs of illness:

Elevated scratching can mean skin allergies, irritation, or infection

Increased drinking can show early signs of kidney disease or diabetes

Excessive licking could be a sign of discomfort, pain, or dietary issues

Sleep disruptions may point to sleep disorders or insomnia

settings.title: Know their fitness
settings.text:
Get custom goals based on your dog’s age, weight, and breed, so you can:

Be sure they're getting enough exercise

See distance traveled, minutes active, and more

Serve the correct food portions

Celebrate and share achievements

settings.title: We're in the business to improve your pet's health

settings.title: Health Monitoring
settings.subtitle:
Catch potential health issues before they become problems. Whistle algorithms analyze your pet's licking, scratching, drinking, and sleeping week-over-week, and alert you to abnormalities.

Send a 30-day summary to your vet by email.

settings.title: Location Alerts
settings.subtitle: Whether it’s a sneaky escape or a stroll with your dog walker, get notified when your pet leaves a designated safe place by email, text, or app alert.

settings.title: Fitness Features
settings.subtitle: Set fitness goals based on breed, age, and weight. Track your pet's calories burned, distance traveled, minutes active, and more. Earn badges for milestones.

settings.title: Whistle Switch Smart Collar Plan
settings.subtitle: Whistle devices cannot be used without a subscription plan. The subscription allows the tracker to update and communicate the data, including GPS, activity and health monitoring.

settings.title: How do I attach and detach the battery?
settings.text:
To attach, align the dot on the side of the battery to the dot on the side of the tracker, then firmly press them together until it snap-locks into place.

To detach, press the tabs on short sides of the battery, then pull away. Some users find it easier to remove the battery when the collar is not on their pet

settings.title: Will the tracker work without cellular service? Can I use Whistle just on WiFi with no cellular service?
settings.text: No, The Whistle Switch needs a cellular connection with AT&T’s LTE network in order to provide locations while away from home

settings.title: How does Whistle track? Is it real-time?
settings.text: In order to find a balance between helpful updates and prolonged battery life, the Whistle is not 100% real-time. Whistle is an assisted-GPS device, which means it uses information from both AT&T cellular towers and satellites to triangulate its position and report it to you

settings.title: Why did I get a false alert?
settings.text: This is typically an issue when the tracker is near a WiFi "dead zone."  Not all homes are built with the same materials, so if your device finds one of these WiFi "dead zones", the GPS accuracy can also be affected, placing your pet's location outside of your Safe Place

settings.title: How do I set up my replacement Whistle?
settings.text: Tap on the Human tab, then select the option for setting up a new Whistle. You’ll have the option to choose your existing pet profile and keep the same subscription

settings.title: Do I need to have an AT&T Plan to use my Whistle?
settings.text: No, your Whistle tracker is like a miniature cell phone for your dog! As such, it requires its own cellular plan, but is separate from the plan you have for your own phone. Whistle leverages AT&T’s 4G network to provide you the greatest coverage and fastest response, but you don’t need to be an AT&T customer to use Whistle. Your 360 subscription plan takes care of the cellular connection, so you can keep on adventuring with no interruptions
